infos.value: Now that's interesting. Robb's leading «Solidus» all th' way up here, is he?
Yes, Your Fierceness.
Even if we leave Oelde's lot as they are, one o' our spies'll be reporting their obliteration soon enough.
And if so...
It's finally time to pull out Hourne's horns.
What the hell are you saying!?
We had a deal!
I will march on to Wezette from here and take Oelde's head.
You plan to just trot on over to Wezette and take out the remaining Leonis forces?
Tch. What drivel. If you ask me, that little plan of yours has zero appeal.
What...?
Now, now, don't misunderstand me.
Oelde's all yours. That hasn't changed.
Just let me go and take care of King Robb, that's all. No problems there, eh?
Do yer plan on going alone?
What is it, ole Muraga? What's eating you?
It feels like someone's lurking around here... Someone from Gouga?
Observant as ever, aren't you?
...Come on out.
My partner, Zazan.
So you're Muraga, eh? You sure seem strong...but that's it. All brawn, no brains.
Were yer hoping to test me?
Oh, looks like I touched a nerve.
Relax, it was just a little banter.
Rairyuu... This is yer partner?
What do you think of him? He's a mad dog, isn't he?
But gods, he's strong. Wouldn't trust him to watch my back if he weren't.
You said he's from Gouga?
Heh. Don't I look the part?
Not that it matters...
As long as I get to rip out a few throats here and there, I don't care what you call me.
It's my purpose in life to take as many lives as possible.
Seems more like a rabid dog to me.
Harharhar! We're hounds of the same pack, you and I!
Yer think the two o' yer are enough to kill Robb?
Heh. Won't know till we try.
I guess we'll be on our way.
As will we.
Hmph...do what yer want.
